overview: Left in the care of his half-breed brother, Buck, by his dying mother, Wallace Layson has no knowledge of his family history.  His father, knowing that his son will inherit a ranch on his 21st birthday, tries to secure the property for himself by persuading a dance hall girl to come between the boy and his fianc√©e.  When Buck learns of the plan he decides to foil it without his half-brother knowing.
tagline: A story of Wyoming when the trail lead from nowhere to nobody and Indians yelled defiance to the white man.
title: Across the Divide
